title: Ajanta Caves
desc: Ajanta Caves are ancient Buddhist caves with exquisite paintings and sculptures, dating back to the 2nd century BCE.

title: Khajuraho Group of Monuments
desc: Khajuraho Group of Monuments is a UNESCO World Heritage Site known for its intricately carved temples depicting human and divine forms.

title: Nanda Devi and Valley of Flowers National Parks
desc: Nanda Devi and Valley of Flowers National Parks together form a UNESCO World Heritage Site, showcasing stunning alpine landscapes and biodiversity.

title: Lonar Crater Lake
desc: Lonar Crater Lake is a unique meteorite impact crater lake, surrounded by lush greenery and geological marvels.

title: Chola Temples
desc: Chola Temples, including Brihadeeswarar Temple, are architectural marvels from the Chola dynasty, showcasing Dravidian temple architecture.

title: Sanchi Stupa
desc: Sanchi Stupa is a Buddhist monument with intricately carved toranas (gateways) and stupas, representing ancient Indian art and architecture.
